title: MERITLINE Twin Over Twin Metal Bunk Bed with Slide, House Bunk Beds Frame with Roof and Built-in Ladder for Kids, Teens, Girls, Boys(Black)
features: 【Kid-Friendly Creativity House Bed 】Our bunk beds twin over twin crafted with a whimsical playhouse design, this house bunk bed offers kids a comfortable and exhilarating experience during both sleep and playtime that will let their imaginations run wild.This playhouse bunk bed frame can be decorated with ribbons,tent or lanterns on the eaves.Let your kids enjoy more fun when sleeping with siblings or sleepovers.

【Metal Twin Bunk Bed with Slide】The low bunk bed with slide offers extra fun to child, and built-in ladder also provides easy access to the top bed . your kids will wake up earlier and happier, just for slide loft .Sweet dream and amazing day started with this slide bunk beds, sleek and space-saving design adds a touch of elegance to the bedroom.

【Convertible Into Two Separate Small Beds】This is a multifunctional bed, the bunk beds can be converted into two separate Twin beds, the roof is also separate and removable,Besides, The slides and ladders can also be swapped.

【Sturdy Metal Bed Frame 】This twin over twin bunk bed is made with sturdy metal that is stable and durable.This rail bunk bed is supported by 20 slats, no need for a spring box, and the load-bearing capacity of the upper bed can reach 250LBS.

【Beds Dimensions】Overall Product Dimension:77.5"L x 41.4"W x84.3"H.Some assembly is required, although we have provided clear instructions and tools. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact one of our friendly customer service representatives.
description: This children's slide bed uses the design concept of the house, with built-in slides and climbing ladders, not only for sleeping, but also for children's entertainment, allowing your child to use their imagination to decorate their own bed. In addition, this bed is also a bed that can be changed, a bunk bed can be transformed into two separate beds, and the roof can also be removed at will to meet your various needs.
